quote: I love sending video messages. Like, I love to send people happy birthday videos 10 seconds long.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the simplicity and impact of personal video messages.
suggested_hook: Want to make a lasting impression with just 10 seconds?

quote: When somebody sees you make them a 30-second video that was just for them, they still have the same reaction of, hey, this feels like television.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the perception that video needs to be high production to be effective.
suggested_hook: Think video is too complicated? Think again.
